MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL60 and LL62 postcode areas of Gaerwen and Bodorgan, affecting a large number of properties in a widespread area. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of repairs required to a faulty piece of equipment and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:10PM on 23rd February 2021.
